member.name: DIALOG_SCALING_BEHAVIOR
member.summary: Describes per-monitor DPI scaling behavior overrides for child windows within dialogs. The values in this enumeration are bitfields and can be combined.

member.name: DIALOG_SCALING_BEHAVIOR.DCDC_DEFAULT
member.summary: The default behavior of the dialog manager. The dialog managed will update the font, size, and position of the child window on DPI changes.

member.name: DIALOG_SCALING_BEHAVIOR.DCDC_DISABLE_FONT_UPDATE
member.summary: Prevents the dialog manager from sending an updated font to the child window via WM_SETFONT in response to a DPI change.

member.name: DIALOG_SCALING_BEHAVIOR.DCDC_DISABLE_RELAYOUT
member.summary: Prevents the dialog manager from resizing and repositioning the child window in response to a DPI change.
